summary:
This mod will add a little animation for player just before waiting in game.That mean
your character will laydown or sitdown or read a book while waiting.The animation will play
randomly.Player will stop Playing animation when waiting is over.
descriptionHtml:
Immersive Waiting

You need SKSE for this mod.

This mod will add a little animation for player just before waiting in game.

That mean your character will laydown or sitdown or read a book while waiting.

The animation will player randomly.Player will stop Playing animation when waiting is over.

To active waiting just press the provided hotkey(BY default Insert Key).
You can always change the key to your liking in MCM menu.


There is another Option in MCM Config named  Wait Key which is your default wait key in your game.(By default T ).Do not change this Key unless you set another button for wait key iny our game.If you changed your wait key then set this key to whatever key you set for your vanilla wait button.

REQUIREMENT
SKSE - version 1.7 or later


CREDITS
SkyUI
SKSE team
author: KashBhimBha
